text: Derek Ho (September 26, 1964 â€” July 17, 2020) was an American surfer. He won the World Surf League championship in 1993. Ho was born in Kailua, Hawaii. On July 17, 2020, Derek Ho suffered a heart attack and died at a Honolulu hospital, aged 55. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Hawaii Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction
title: Derek Ho
